title: The Young Kaga Lady's Mystery Tour (Part 2)

infobox.English title:: The Young Kaga Lady's Mystery Tour

sections.Situation:
Ran just won a trip to Kanazawa and decides to go there along with Kogoro and Conan.
There, they meet a mysterious lady, Mari Hayashi, who reveals herself to be quite rich. They help her get to the location she wants and later head there by themselves. As they arrive, they see a robber trying to steal the heavy bag Mari was carrying and rapidly stop him. As they ask her about the bag's contents, she just nods and goes away. Later, they meet her again and ask her where was her bag as she was walking empty-handed. She reveals to them that Manabu Saikawa, who works for her family has been kidnapped and that the bag had the ransom money, 30 Million Yen. The four of them then go to the ransom location to find out the money has been taken.

After going to the Hayashis' house to investigate, Kogoro gathers all suspects to reveal that Saikawa staged his own kidnapping so he could get the money. Saikawa then angrily throws the bag at them and runs away.

The next morning, the police carries Soichi away and tell the people involved that Soichi will recover. Kogoro and Conan find some gold dust on the crime scene and deduce that Takumi Kondo might be involved with it since he works in gold crafting. Kondo reveals he only went to meet him and didn't hit him. Back at the house, they receive a call saying that Rintaro Hagino was kidnapped. By listening to the call, Conan deduces they have to go to Komatsu, which has the only airport in the area and that Hagino must be held captive there. At the train station's entrance, Conan and Ran stumble across Saikawa, who was trying to go by undetected and they chase him to a house where Kogoro is in front of, having been given the authority to bring Hagino's ransom money.

They arrive at the house along with Kaede, Kondo, Mari and the police which have been called to come. Kogoro finds Hagino and unties him asking him where was Saikawa. There, Conan stuns Kogoro with his wristwatch to expel the truth.

sections.Resolution:
He also tried to let Manabu Saikawa, his accomplice for stealing the ransom, die of blood loss inside a cupboard.
Although not stated, the robber who tried to snatch Mari's ransom bag was likely Hagino.
sections.Trivia:
- The taxi used by Mari Hayashi to go to her ransom location is a dark blue Toyota Crown. The license plate is 加賀 530, あ 20-60 (Kaga 530, A 20-60).
- The taxi used by Mari to go to Komatsu is another dark blue Toyota Crown. Its license plate is 加賀 500, あ 47-09 (Kaga 500, A 47-09).
